response.overview: In the early hours of May 1, 1967, Priscilla Beaulieu takes her final steps toward becoming the wife of the King of Rock 'n' Roll, Elvis Presley. This intimate short film explores the hours before their iconic wedding at the Aladdin Hotel in Las Vegas, capturing Priscillaâ€™s reflections, emotions, and the whirlwind secrecy surrounding the event. Featuring standout performances by Lexi Bohrer as Priscilla Presley, Lauren Inazu, and Mickey Stone, and directed by Derek Bailey, Becoming Mrs. Presley brings to life the untold moments behind a historic love story. Shot in West Plains, Missouri, this project highlights both a timeless romance and the pressures of life under the spotlight. Follow the journey of love, secrecy, and destiny in this compelling short film.
response.title: Becoming Mrs. Presley
